Context: The Chancellor's Circle is an exclusive annual membership program at George Brown College with unique membership benefits and event invitations. Members can designate their annual donation to scholarships and bursaries or the college's area of greatest need. For more information, please contact Gabriella Goutam at gabriella.goutam@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-5000 ext. 3289. The Chancellor of George Brown College is Noella Milne. To receive updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, and tours, sign up on the website. Other contact information includes 416-415-2000 for general inquiries and TTY: 1-877-515-5559 for telecommunications devices for the deaf. The email address to ask questions is ask.george@georgebrown.ca. George Brown College Foundation's website contains information that is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying college fee requirements.
